title: Achamillai Achamillai Maname Song Lyrics Bagavathi
stanzas:
achamillai achamillai manamae
vetriyellaam ini ivan vasamae
mothaathae!
ivannidam mothaathae!

achamillai achamillai manamae
vetriyellaam ini ivan vasamae

ivan nadakkum
dhisaiyae kilakkaiy maaruthu
edukkum mudivae
theerppaai airuthu

ivan ezhunthaal
idiyin mulakkam kaetkuthu
nadanthaal ethirikkum
bayathaal vaerkutthu

siru ulithaan malaiyai
thagarthu kaattudhu.
thulaiyitta piragae
moongil isaikkuthu.

achamillai achamillai manamae
vetriyellaam ini ivan vasamae
mothaatha!
thuninthavan vaaraandaa!
mothaathae!
ivannidam mothaathae!
